p: The preconditioned 50/30 Î¼m solid-phase microextraction (SPME) fiber assembly DVB/CAR/PDMS purchased from Supelco (Cassopolis, MI, USA) was used to extract VOCs from samples HS. The extracted analytes were sampled through CTC CombiPAL auto-sampler (CTC Analytics, Zwingen, Switzerland), purchased from AMR (Tokyo, Japan).
